column1: Art Institute of Chicago////When I was in college and the museum was free on Tuesdays
column2: I was here pretty much every week.  One of the guards knew me by name
column3: even.  It's a grandiose place with some of the best art in the world.  My favorite collections are the Modern and Impressionism collections.  There's something for everyone here.  If you haven't been
column4: you need to go.  And if you have been
